text: I can only SSH to my departament’s computer if I am inside my university’s VPN. University’s VPN doesn’t allow SSH’ing to the external supercomputer, so I cannot use two computers at a time.

elements.text: I can only SSH to my departament’s computer if I am inside my university’s VPN. University’s VPN doesn’t allow SSH’ing to the external supercomputer, so I cannot use two computers at a time.

text: You actually just run one instance of the ssh client behind a vpn and one not. for more details consult your OS specific information of choice
Wow, didn’t know this was possible/easy
